goal: Create an event on 17th July, 2024, wednesday 9AM called 'Sync with Emily', add a Google Meet and make sure Emily is added. In the description add 'Marketing updates' and set the notifications for 5 minutes before.

evals.description: An event named 'Sync with Emily' was created and saved
The event has the correct description 'Marketing updates'
The event has a Google Meet link (hasMeeting is true)

evals.rubric: Does the event include Emily as a guest and set notification for 5 minutes before?

evals.description: The event is scheduled for July 17th, 2024 at 9AM
